phrases.phrase: Automatically watch media that you create or when you reply
Click here to view more media from {source}
Click here to view the media library page for this item "{media}"

[QUOTE][CENTER][SIZE=4]An administrator or the original uploader has deleted this media from the library.[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=6][B]This thread has now been automatically locked.[/B][/SIZE][/CENTER][/QUOTE]
A thread will be created in "{forum}" for this submission.
Unless specifically defined (using the "edit" buttons next to each item), all media submitted will get assigned the following default values:

Are you sure you wish to delete this category?
Existing media will be moved to the parent node.
Are you sure you wish to delete this media?
Are you sure you wish to delete this playlist?
Are you sure you wish to delete this service? You will be unable to delete this service if there are any media which require it.
Disabled categories will not be open for media submission.
IP address information for comment by {user}
Media added by "{user}". Click here to view this user's profile.
This media already exists in the media library.
You may filter results by keywords using the form to the right.
Media hosted on "{service}" media streaming service.

This media is currently in the moderation queue. Only people who know the link will be able to view it.
This media will not appear in any public spaces until it has been reviewed and approved by a moderator.
Each keyword should be separated with a comma. ( , )
Media URL did not match any supported services.
Media URL did not retrieve valid data.
You may tag member usernames to this media
{poster} left a comment on the media {title}.
There has not yet been any media added to this category...
There has not yet been any media added to this playlist...
Disabling the animated keyword cloud will default to a static cloud.
If set, the auto thread creation check box will be checked by default.
Autoposted threads will be posted to this forum. (unspecify to disable)
If set, threads will automatically get locked to prevent posting. If this setting is enabled, when a user clicks on a media thread, they will instead be brought to the media and comment page.
If set, media will automatically begin playing when displayed in the library.
The maximum number of keywords to display on the keyword cloud.
Show comments in BB Code Overlay
Enabling this option will display an enhanced bb code overlay which allows inline commenting.
The maximum number of comments to display per page on media details.

The maximum number of keywords to display in a *booru-style list on the sidebar of listing pages.
Results will be limited based on the number of keylinks; then sorted alphabetically. (0 to disable)
Include full message text in watched media notification emails.

With this option enabled, notification emails sent to users watching media will contain the full text of the message about which they are being notified. With this option disabled, they will need to visit the forum to read the message.
Keyword icons should be 24x24 and stored at /styles/8wayrun/keywords/<text>.jpg
The maximum text size for keywords displayed in the keyword cloud.
The maximum length required for a keyword. Keywords longer will be truncated.
The maximum number of media to display per page on categories.
The minimum text size for keywords displayed in the keyword cloud.
The minimum length required for a keyword. Keywords shorter will be ignored.
Disabling new keywords will prevent users from creating new keywords.

You can set media submissions to not automatically retrieve keywords.
This function will fail if "Create New Keywords" is disabled.
Comments will be worth this many trending points.
Trend ratings decay over time based on these number of seconds.
Likes will be worth this many trending points.
Trend ratings decay over time based on these number of seconds.
Views will be worth this many trending points.
By default, only basic word characters are permitted in keywords.
Playlists added by "{user}". Click here to view this user's profile.
Please select a new parent category node... all existing media within this category will be moved to the selected new category.
The provided file is not a service XML file.
Are you sure you wish to remove this media from this playlist?
Please select a default bulk category...
Someone likes one of your media
Someone replies to a media you are watching
The end of this playlist has been reached
There are still {more} more items in this playlist
There are no media to display.
This is a list of all the media that you are watching.
This is a list of the {count} most recently-updated media with unread comments that you are watching.
Unable to delete this service as there are currently {count} media using this service in the media library.
Please select a category for your media...
Please enter a duration for your media...
Please enter some keywords for your media...
Please enter a title for your media...
This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the media {media} at {board} with email notification of new replies.
To stop receiving email, please change your watching options for this media. You may also review all your watched media.
{receiver}, {replier} replied to a media you are watching at {board}.
{name} replied to the media {title}. There may be more comments after this.
Your comment has been posted; it will show up shortly...
You are watching this media. Use the button below if you would like to stop watching this media.
You do not have any watched media that are unread.
You have not selected any valid media
You have not selected a valid option
You have not selected any valid playlist
You are not watching any media.
Are you sure you want to like this media?
Are you sure you want to like this playlist?
Are you sure you want to unlike this media?
Are you sure you want to unlike this playlist?

<form action="{xen:link 'media/comment/delete', $comment}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator" id="CommentDeleter" data-comment="{$comment.comment_id}">
<xen:include template="helper_deletion_type_unit" />
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase delete_post}" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>

<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>
